tika.dc.description:
From the author of Hacks for Minecrafters comes the most encompassing guide ever to command blocks in the world of Minecraft!
With Hacks for Minecrafters: Command Blocks, kids will learn everything they need to know about manipulating and programming command blocks within Minecraft. As well as clearly explaining all the commands and how to use them, this book has tons of fun tricks and projects for making your own custom maps and mini-games. Other tips cover:
Giving and getting loot
Making teams with the scoreboard
Customizing villagers
Supercharging mobs with data tags
Creating a massive fireworks display
Combining command blocks to make programs
Making custom maps: adventure maps, parkour maps, and more!
Packed with expert tips, cheats, and hacks on command blocks, including a full reference to all the commands and exactly how you use them, and with over one hundred screenshots, Hacks for Minecrafters: Command...
